source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.headline: A Manager's Go-to-Guide to Leverage AI at Work (Now, a Book Released Worldwide by Asia's Largest Publisher of IT Books!)
objectives_summary: Continued access to latest articles on groundbreaking AI developments
7 Principles to lead an AI journey in an organization
Key techniques of Machine Learning & Deep Learning

items.headline: Design A Branded Customer Experience That Differentiates
objectives_summary: Learn how to define a brand purpose that will set the scene for your customer experience and align your organisation.

items.title: The Ultimate Virtual Meetings Course - Lead Better Meetings
items.headline: Put the productivity back into meetings, take effective meeting minutes and take back control of your time management.
objectives_summary: How to run productive and effective meetings
What to do before, during, and after every meeting
How to take helpful meeting minutes during meetings

items.title: Success starts with a proper goal setting
items.headline: A 5-step guide for you who look for a successful start of business or project
objectives_summary: A 5-step guide for you who look for a successful start of business or project

items.title: Down To Business: Business Management From the First Step
items.headline: Learn how to plan, organize, lead, and monitor people and teams to take your business to the next level.
objectives_summary: Understand how businesses work like a system and what factors are critical to their survival
Appreciate of how global environment affects local businesses
Recognize  the impact of regulations and fiscal policies on business

items.title: Strategic Management for Beginner
items.headline: Strategic Management & Competitiveness, External Environment, The Internal Organization, Business - Level Strategy
objectives_summary: Student will understand the competitive landscape; the resource-based model; the I/O model; vision and mission; and strategic leaders
Student will recognize The external and internal environment
Student will recognize business Level strategy

items.title: Network Leadership: An Introduction

items.headline: Practical skills and strategies for leading knowledge-intensive and digitally-connected teams and organizations
objectives_summary: Types of organizational networks
Kinds of relationships used to construct networks
The four roles that leaders and followers play in a network

items.title: Leadership for Engineers: High-Impact Engineering Leadership
items.headline: Step Up from Manager to Leader with Vision, Strategy, Culture, Purpose, Influence, Delegation, Communication and more
objectives_summary: Lead Engineers with Confidence
Engage and Inspire your People
Engineer a Great Culture

items.title: HR Metrics & Analytics in HRM
items.headline: HR Metrics & Analytics, Calculate different functions of HRM
objectives_summary: HR functions
Different HR ratios & calculations
Cost per hire

items.headline: Team Leadership, Inter-team communication skills, meeting management, risk & change management, conflict resolution
objectives_summary: Team leader

items.title: How to Automate your Small Business
items.headline: Make a plan for introducing automation into key areas of your business and understand the software required.
objectives_summary: Get a good understanding of what software tools you need to get started with business automation.
You will have an implementation plan for bringing automation into every area of your business.

items.title: Parallel Thinking Methods for Better Meetings and Decisions

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Speaker, Lecturer on Lateral Thinking and Innovation
visible_instructors.title: Paul Sloane
visible_instructors.name: Paul

items.headline: Learn the Hats Method, the Disney Method and the NHS Method
objectives_summary: How to facilitate highly effective Meetings which deliver better decisions faster
The Hats Method - based on ideas in the book, Six Thinking Hats by Edward De Bono
The Disney Method - a structured brainstorm method for generating and refining creative ideas

items.title: Lean A3 Process Management

visible_instructors.job_title: Energetic MBA, Coach, and Six Sigma Black Belt
visible_instructors.title: Robert Kent
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Utilizing the A3 Lean Managment tool to improve your processes
objectives_summary: Students will be able to apply lean six sigma principles and develop a 1-page roadmap for success

items.title: LEADERSHIP LESSONS - From the people you lead!
items.headline: THE NEW APPROACH FOR CULTURE-LED LEADERSHIP:  Leaders can best learn leadership skills from the people they lead.
objectives_summary: Find out exactly what to do (and what not to do) so that followers choose to call you "LEADER"
Understand the link between a culture of world class leadership and customer delight
Discover why – and under what circumstances, someone becomes a leader

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt for IT Professionals

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert trainer for Lean | Lean Six Sigma | Creative Thinking
visible_instructors.title: Koundinya Nemana (Edushore)
visible_instructors.name: Koundinya

items.headline: Green Belt certification course exclusively designed for professionals who are working in IT and Technology companies!
objectives_summary: Simplified explanations of all the concepts of Lean Six Sigma Green Belt with practical examples and exercises designed exclusively for IT industry scenarios.
Multiple exercises (with key) for each module with detailed (step by step) instructions. All you need is MS Excel for these exercises and you can download these exercise files.
A real case study of how a Lean Six Sigma Green Belt project is driven to improve an IT industry process.

items.title: Change Management: How To Drive And Adapt
items.headline: Take Your Organization to the Next Level by Embracing Change, Improving Your Communication with a Proven Framework
objectives_summary: Successfully implement a change policy in their business
Adapt to new business environments and take fast decisions
Improve their communication skills
